subtitle: Welcome to this guided meditation

since it's so crucial and important for

we're going to get in touch with this in order to get a sense for a more
natural, a more purer way of perceiving reality...
so get in touch with your body, take a few minutes to just stretch, relax
and get into your most comfortable position
you can cross your legs, you can sit on a chair, you can put your feet on the ground, you can sit in bed,
and stretch your legs out, whichever you like, as long as your back and spine is relatively straight
then we're all okay
not tensing
not trying to
get ourselves into a very strained position - just relaxed comfortable

don't stress about this but if you can let's intend to
not move the physical body during this meditation
it's okay if you have an itch or you want to move
that's absolutely fine but you'll find the more advanced you become in meditation
it will become easier to go long periods without the need, without the feeling, to move your physical
body during the entire practice, and by doing so we find a gradual growing inner stillness...
a stillness that doesn't just pervade on a physical level but also pervades our mind ~
